website_summaries.verdict: The moisture-wicking and UV properties of these pants make them a great choice for summer workouts.
pros: Four-way stretch gives you a full range of motion
True to size and fits comfortably without being too tight in the waist
cons: These pants have long legs, so they may be too long for you if your legs are short

customer_reviews.title: I love the Under Armour HeatGear products
customer_reviews.text: I love the Under Armour HeatGear products , I wear them mostly for motorcycle riding. Worn under my leather pants it makes my life much easier when I need to remove the pants ( sweat and leather makes your pants glue tight to your leg ). A must have for the East Coast hot weather , the slightest wind you get will help you stay chill with the UA HeatGear products. I have the compression shirt as well that I wear under my riding jacket.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew D

customer_reviews.title: Ahhhh feels so good
customer_reviews.text: My only knock is the legs are a little to long. I'm 6'3" at 210 so I got the XL. But the compression is the best I've had so far It keeps the boys nice and snug, and does a great job compressing the thigh and calves. I recently started taking Yoga and I could not believe what a difference these leggings made. FYI... If you don't want to stand out, I would go with the black. The whites are very white and caused a lot of people to stare.
customer_reviews.author: Phillip Clifton

customer_reviews.title: These fit fine! If you want them a little looser
customer_reviews.text: I'm 6 foot tall, 185lbs.. I got the mediums after reading reviews about sizing.. When I pulled them out of the package I thought no way would they fit! They do!! They're tight, as compression pants should be. In jeans I wear 32 inch waist, and 34 inch inseam. These fit fine! If you want them a little looser, maybe order a large.. For me? They fit really well.
customer_reviews.author: Rob Rabb

customer_reviews.title: Great workout pants!!
customer_reviews.text: These are perfect for working out. I love them. I bought the grey ones in medium and bunched up at the bottom so I thought I would try the small instead. They were both the same length just that the waist was smaller than the medium. I still wear them but i would stick with the medium so I bought another medium pair in black. Great product overall i love them. It doesnt bother me that they bunch up at the bottom.
customer_reviews.author: Najera

customer_reviews.title: They were great fit and they were even early getting to my ...
customer_reviews.text: They were great fit and they were even early getting to my home
customer_reviews.author: Leah Shelton

customer_reviews.title: GREAT Compression Leggings!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love these compression pants. I have been looking for an alternative for my calf compression sleeves for Basketball, these compression pants are THE WAY TO GO! It feels like an extra boost on your legs because they stay warm and it helps me play longer. I wish I've worn these years ago, man have I been missing out! I used to get very bad shin splints but for ME this has stopped me from getting them and keeps my legs warm for the whole "run".
customer_reviews.author: MikeLee661

customer_reviews.title: I'm able to keep nice and warm while walking to and from work here ...
customer_reviews.text: A bit tighter than the other sports under garments, hence the "compression" adjective in the name. I'm able to keep nice and warm while walking to and from work here in Boston.
customer_reviews.author: Apollo Clark

customer_reviews.title: Hip/waist band is WAY too tight
customer_reviews.text: I'm 6'1, 195 LBS with 24.5' thighs and 16.5' calves. My waist is about 32' and my Hips are 37'. After reading the reviews I decided to go with a Medium. The quality is good and it fits well in the leg area since these are compression leggings, but the waist band is *WAY too tight*. Wish I have went for a bigger size as these are really uncomfortable around the waist. Even to the point that it gets painful after wearing them for more than 20 minutes :(
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Kept me perfectly comfortable in the wet
customer_reviews.text: Wore them every day of an April holiday hiking around Ireland. Kept me perfectly comfortable in the wet, often-dreary weather that we routinely walked through. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Dinovi

customer_reviews.title: Even though they look so small out of the package, they stretched to fit perfectly.
customer_reviews.text: Even though they look so small out of the package, they stretched to fit perfectly. They are especially wonderful to wear under dress pants during the cold winter since they don't bunch but add an extra layer to cut the cold.
customer_reviews.author: melas

customer_reviews.title: NOT transparent
customer_reviews.text: Great product, NOT too transparent as some other reviews say. Of course it's not 2" thick, but we definitely don't see through. Unfortunately I crashed w/ my bike so that helped protecting me a little but I have to buy another now...
customer_reviews.author: FLO

customer_reviews.title: GREAT compression pant
customer_reviews.text: These pants were bought for my boyfriend, fit perfectly, long on the legs. No complaints about these pants just were not the exact orange I was looking for. If you're aware of Under Armour, their orange is a SLIGHT, VERY SLIGHT reddish orange. The shirt I had to go with was a washed orange so didn't go. Other than that, GREAT compression pant!
customer_reviews.author: alicia roark

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good overall
customer_reviews.text: Pretty good overall. As far as the waist goes it is a good fit but it is pretty long. If I pull it all the way up it would go past my belly button.
customer_reviews.author: Bainizzle

customer_reviews.title: Poor fit
customer_reviews.text: I had no problem with seller. Leggings did not fit, so I sought other vendors for more firm fit.
customer_reviews.author: JOTS - USA

customer_reviews.title: Vivid color and nice fit
customer_reviews.text: These are for my husband who is 5' 10" 150 lbs and he needed a medium. I would have thought he would need small, but these are definitely tight and run small. They are sufficiently warm for running in Chicago. My husband says they feel nice around his ankles, but he fears after too much use they become loose.
customer_reviews.author: Mandy

customer_reviews.title: ...a "Swamp Cooler Effect," maybe?
customer_reviews.text: It does, in fact, somehow manage to keep you cooler in hot weather. Counter-intuitive, but true. ONE CAVEAT, though: after a certain level of humidity, the gear seems to fail at this goal... Call it a "Swamp Cooler Effect," maybe?
customer_reviews.author: Nom de Plume

customer_reviews.title: Love Them
customer_reviews.text: What can I say but it fits the great quality of Under Armour name.
customer_reviews.author: K D

customer_reviews.title: Excellent for jogging
customer_reviews.text: Excellent for jogging. I have used them in mid 30's-60's temperature. I also used them under Jeans to cut the winter cold feel. I am 5'11 195lbs athletic body. Size large are perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Jairo Poveda

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I ordered.
customer_reviews.text: Great for working in very hot and humid conditions, eliminates, heat rash.
customer_reviews.author: brian s. lake

customer_reviews.title: UA UA UA! Loving these more and more!
customer_reviews.text: A little long but serves its purpose! Take with a grain of salt: Longer in length than Nike's Large
customer_reviews.author: Kinglouiexxx

customer_reviews.title: Somewhat large and not too thin
customer_reviews.text: These compression tights are a bit long. I have to pull them up higher and sometimes fold over at the top. I put them in the dryer when washing to get them to tighten up some. The UA compression tights seem to be a bit thicker than Nike's, which can be good or bad, depending on the time of year and how you are using the compression tights.
customer_reviews.author: dREW

customer_reviews.title: GREAT FIT AND WORTH THE EXTRA PRICEING
customer_reviews.text: You get what you pay for. These babies are more money than a lot of compression pants but the fit and feel are superior.
customer_reviews.author: richard c maxwell

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love them! Going to order more Update: My second order somehow I selected a company in the U.K. It took much longer than expected to arrive due to this so be sure to not make my mistake lol.
customer_reviews.author: Jake

customer_reviews.title: Success!
customer_reviews.text: My husband wears a 30 pant and is 5'9" and we bought a medium. He says they fit perfectly. He wears these to the gym all the time and even under ski clothes occasionally. Definitely would purchase again!
customer_reviews.author: Elle Dodd

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great compression leggings....as most of under armour product...feel nice on skin
customer_reviews.author: Lorenzo Fascio

customer_reviews.title: Under Armour Comp Leggings
customer_reviews.text: My son is a size Large, but had to get a XL for these leggings. Of course it's meant to be a tight fit, but the waist is smaller on these in comparison to other Under Armour bottoms. That being said, they are solid UA quality.
customer_reviews.author: blondie2011

customer_reviews.title: Good for what they are.
customer_reviews.text: These are good for what they are. Have bought 3 or 4 from different sellers based on price.
customer_reviews.author: RB

customer_reviews.title: motivational style
customer_reviews.text: Husband wears a 42 waist and is has lost about 14 pounds. He looks stylish at cardiac rehab and is motivated to wear and attend --- with a pair of exercise shorts over them. XX large is the right size for him.
customer_reviews.author: Grandma Jo

customer_reviews.title: Read the coldgear vs heatgear
customer_reviews.text: Pay attention to the differences of heatgear and coldgear. This is a great product but I ordered the wrong ones.
customer_reviews.author: Eddy

customer_reviews.title: Can you say..."awesome"?
customer_reviews.text: Awesome, awesome, awesome! Good bye cold weather! Get these if you are out in the elements! Be sure to layer normal clothes over the top and you are good to go!
customer_reviews.author: Lee

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic product
customer_reviews.text: First compression pants purchased as recommended by a friend. Fits comfortably, looks great and performs as intended. Legs feel cooler for cardio and lower body excercises. Have worn them about 3-4 times per week since having them, only some frayed threads here and there but nothing to be worried about.
customer_reviews.author: Osman

customer_reviews.title: Abandon the nike pro-combats, these are the way to go
customer_reviews.text: I have 3 or 4 pairs of the nike pro combat compressions, which are nice; but i LOVE these under armour leggings. The fit is awesome and they seem to be a much more durable quality and heavier than the nike's. I will def. be buying more
customer_reviews.author: CNellyTX

customer_reviews.title: My husband wanted these for his triathlons, but when ...
customer_reviews.text: My husband wanted these for his triathlons, but when he came down with a cold, it certainly kept him warm!
customer_reviews.author: ASG

customer_reviews.title: I really like this for no-gi BJJ but am noticing it's starting ...
customer_reviews.text: I really like this for no-gi BJJ but am noticing it's starting to get a little pilly around the knees after a couple months.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew P Dingle

customer_reviews.title: Great for the tall and lanky!
customer_reviews.text: My son is a 6'4" 175 lb. competitive goalkeeper, and it's always been a challenge to fit him properly because he is so long and lean, as well as the physical demands of his position. He's had these same compression pants before and liked them, but we never knew about the "tall" option. These fit amazingly well and the extra length makes all the difference!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Waist band rulls up and cuts in...
customer_reviews.text: Waist band rolls in and cuts in... just like shorts... I bought a pair of in Mark Weldon and they are much better.... I suggest that you check their's out...
customer_reviews.author: WALTER G LUND

customer_reviews.title: they fit best and last
customer_reviews.text: My 6'5" soccer player wears no other compression gear other than under armour, they fit best and last!
customer_reviews.author: rebecca l. harris

customer_reviews.title: Cheap iron on logo
customer_reviews.text: Fits as expected. I read reviews before bought. But, the UA logo on back of right leg is peeling off after my sons only had them since Christmas. Makes them look horrible now.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Reeves

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit, price, and quick delivery
customer_reviews.text: My boyfriend saw these compression leggings in Dicks Sporting Goods, and the Under Amour store, for more than he wanted to pay. I hopped on Amazon and quickly found the same pair for almost $20 less! They shipped quickly, and were exactly what he wanted. Great material, safe packaging. Item was exactly as described and expected.
customer_reviews.author: Christina Brunelle

customer_reviews.title: They help to reduce fatigue!
customer_reviews.text: These compression pants help to reduce fatigue during exercise. I ride bicycles. Sometimes several miles. I have noticed reduced fatigue after the workout when I wear these pants.
customer_reviews.author: Albee_10

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Amazing quality you can tell the difference with other brands
customer_reviews.author: Healthypops1986

customer_reviews.title: I like them. They could breathe a bit more as ...
customer_reviews.text: My first pair of compression pants. I like them. They could breathe a bit more as right now my but can sweat on a bad day. Other than that I'm looking to get a second pair. I'll see if they have something lighter though for the breathe-ability.
customer_reviews.author: dnoyeB

customer_reviews.title: 100% satisfied
customer_reviews.text: These are perfect for what I was looking for. My son is 14 yrs old, 6' 2" and weighs 143 lbs and the tall medium fit perfectly~
customer_reviews.author: Laurel L MacDonald

customer_reviews.title: husband and according to him it's a great base layer or can be worn under shorts when ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought a large for my 6'0" 175 lb. husband and according to him it's a great base layer or can be worn under shorts when working out. Bought these for my son as well and he said the same thing.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Second skin, but better
customer_reviews.text: Skin tight, allows for full range of motion. I forget I'm wearing them sometimes. They work great for soaking up my sweat and cooling my down when there's a breeze
customer_reviews.author: Bijan A.

customer_reviews.title: Keeps you toasty
customer_reviews.text: Very warm and fits well. No need to size up. Fits without bunching under clothes. Great in a cold winter.
customer_reviews.author: dlee

customer_reviews.title: ... compression tights from other manufactures and they definitely offer excellent 'compression'. These aren't bad but I don't g
customer_reviews.text: I have compression tights from other manufactures and they definitely offer excellent 'compression'. These aren't bad but I don't get as much support as I would have hoped. Still a good product for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Jelewis

customer_reviews.title: Fit well
customer_reviews.text: They fit perfect. I wore them for track whenever it was cold and they worked well. They even saved my knee one time when I fell.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight sun protection for sports
customer_reviews.text: Work very well for me. Improves my exercise recovery. Also great for sun protection.
customer_reviews.author: Stefan Frisch

customer_reviews.title: these fit nice and are quality made
customer_reviews.text: I prefer the older version of these compression pants; however, these fit nice and are quality made.
customer_reviews.author: Joyce Wise

customer_reviews.title: Super product for working out or running.
customer_reviews.text: Great product. I had a couple of pairs of these in white and ordered a couple more but in black (no reason why). They keep your calfs and thighs warm so they don't tighten up during workouts and they just feel good. Good product. Fit great.
customer_reviews.author: Charlie

customer_reviews.title: We originally bought them for my husbands superhero costume but ...
customer_reviews.text: We originally bought them for my husbands superhero costume but he likes them and wears them under other clothes when it's cold.
customer_reviews.author: Patty

customer_reviews.title: They fit great and were VERY comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Went snowboarding in Copper Mountain for a week and wore these every other day. They fit great and were VERY comfortable. Although all of these product seem to be over priced.
customer_reviews.author: Gene

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for using under the GI (kimono) for Martial Arts
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for using under the GI (kimono) for Martial Arts. I use in the winter under the gi pants for BJJ and it's like a second skin.
customer_reviews.author: Luis Amendola

customer_reviews.title: The awesome red color was perfect for my old time Sioux ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for 2 reasons 1) I already own base layers for hunting and they perform well for me. The awesome red color was perfect for my old time Sioux Native American regalia out fit
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good quality product
customer_reviews.text: Good quality material and fits as expected. I use them in the gym everyday and they offer a good level of comfort. Would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Edson Williams

customer_reviews.title: These pants are cool!
customer_reviews.text: I wear these leggings while playing football and they extremely comfortable. I also like the cooling effect it has on a warmer day.
customer_reviews.author: omerome

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: These are exactly what my son has been looking for. Worked perfect for under his football pants to keep him warm, and matched our school colors.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Warm but Sweaty...
customer_reviews.text: Went to Alaska for a month...Sept for hunting...Worked well and kept me warm...Does not wiki sweat in that climate... no problems other wise...
customer_reviews.author: Perry O

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Product meets all of my requirements as to quality, fit, and price.
customer_reviews.author: Litenin

customer_reviews.title: No Substitute
customer_reviews.text: I have no basis for comparison on compression leggings, but in my mind these are the only leggings you will ever need. Under Armour does it again.
customer_reviews.author: Will C.

customer_reviews.title: Yoga pant smoga pants
customer_reviews.text: Makes me look like a woman and I love it

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very Good Product. I cannot stop wearing it. I would recommend this to anyone.

customer_reviews.title: I use this for Spartan Race
customer_reviews.text: I'm 5'6" and I pack decent a mount side of muscle in my body specially legs.. The medium fits perfectly on me

customer_reviews.title: Decent gear for hockey.
customer_reviews.text: I'm a small guy and these things are too tight and too small.
customer_reviews.author: G. Rivet

customer_reviews.title: Tighten up
customer_reviews.text: Fits great and I actually feel I can run a bit faster & longer wearing the leggings
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: These leggings were perfect for my son to wear when track season opened and the weather wasn't cooperating!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Stanley

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: I am happy with the compression pants. I wear them under my workout shorts during the colder months.
customer_reviews.author: Roy I.

customer_reviews.title: Get what you pay for but look for $30 sale price
customer_reviews.text: Ordered a small 5'10" 145lbs fits great I have long legs but stretches and stays in place without ridding up anywhere. Good quality material better then Tessla and cold gear/heat gear get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.author: Seth

customer_reviews.title: Great item perfect for football!
customer_reviews.text: Got these for my son! He loved them, fits great, looks good under his football pants, nice quality too! I'd highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Jes Miner

customer_reviews.title: Durable, keeps my son cool!
customer_reviews.text: Works well to keep my son cool when he does sports, and as is usual with under armour the material the pants are made of is durable, however, my son said that the tights did not compress a lot, but otherwise work very well.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Do not waste your money on these
customer_reviews.text: Do not waste your money on these. My son is 15 and wore them 1 time on a grass field playing Lacrosse. He fell and the knee ripped out... VERY DISAPPOINTED!!

customer_reviews.title: Performed as intended!!
customer_reviews.text: What can I say? It is Under Armour, after all!!

customer_reviews.title: Highly Recommended
customer_reviews.text: I have one pair of the Cold Gear compression pants and now this pair and they are both very comfortable.

customer_reviews.title: Good fit
customer_reviews.text: Bought for teenage son. He loves them. They fit as expected

customer_reviews.title: Would buy again

customer_reviews.title: Fits as expected, good buy
customer_reviews.text: Sizing specified is perfect, this is really good and shipped fast!

customer_reviews.title: I wear this under my hockey gear and I love it. Good quality and keeps me relatively cool
customer_reviews.text: I wear this under my hockey gear and I love it. Good quality and keeps me relatively cool. I was afraid that it would wear holes in the under armor but has held up well so far.

customer_reviews.text: Legs were too loose, but afraid the next smaller size would be too tight in the waist. Had to send back.

customer_reviews.text: I originally ordered a size too small for me and had to return and exchange. I got the next size up and it worked out perfect.

customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a compression pant to wear that was lightweight and kept me cool working out in the summer, and these were perfect. I'm a big guy and they actually fit me perfect.

customer_reviews.title: ... is 6'2" and athletic and the XL fits him perfect.
customer_reviews.text: My husband is 6'2" and athletic and the XL fits him perfect.

customer_reviews.title: I Now Regularly Jump Over Tall Buildings With A Single Bound!
customer_reviews.text: I hate to admit it but these are phenomenal compression pants. First of all, I have a long torso but short legs - which means that all pants I buy drag on the ground. Annoying. But these pants allow me to pick a shorter inseam - and they fit perfectly!! The material breathes, wicks away sweat, hugs your legs and look great under shorts. The elastic at the waistband is secure but not tight. Buy these and you will be happy.
customer_reviews.author: John Galt

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Not compression pants, but they are a comfy base layer.
customer_reviews.author: I like stuff 259

product_meta.title: Under Armour Men's HG Compression Leggings
product_meta.description: HeatGear fabric, with all the benefits of UA Compression, comfortable enough to be worn all day. UPF 30+ protects your skin from the sun's harmful rays. 4-way stretch construction moves better in every direction. Material wicks sweat & dries really fast. Anti-odor technology prevents the growth of odor-causing microbes. Engineered elastic waistband with ARMOUR wordmark. Inseam: 26".
feature_bullets: HeatGear fabric, with all the benefits of UA Compression, comfortable enough to be worn all day
UPF 30 protects your skin from the sun's harmful rays
4 way stretch construction moves better in every direction
Material wicks sweat & dries really fast
Anti odor technology prevents the growth of odor causing microbes
